job_posting_notice: For Job Posting: Self-promotion, contact information, or uses violating system terms are not allowed. Posts violating these terms will be removed immediately.
job_description_notice: When someone is interested, you'll receive notifications through system contacts.
job_description_details: Describe your job requirements, such as job info. Purpose, target audience, action plan, etc. Details: Number of deliverables, scope, requirements, etc. (Contact information such as email, phone, LINE, or other contact details are not allowed)
intended_use_notice: To help freelancers propose suitable work
